Title: Fool Me Once
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Sara Hess, Piper Kerman (book)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Laura Prepon, Michael Harney, Michelle Hurst
Plot: After discovering a series of sad truths, friendships change. Tiffany 'Pennsatucky' Doggett is offended by Piper Chapman, and that lead to the dangerous roads. Larry finally meets Piper after the radio show to discuss their future.
